JobFullDesc: The Product Data Operations (PDO) team trains and refines the efficacy of machine learning algorithms across our family of apps and products. As a Manager on the PDO team, you are responsible for managing a team of Product Data Operations Project Managers who partner with product, engineering, data science, vendor partners and scaled operations enablement teams to improve product features and user experience for Facebook and/or Instagram applications. Making Facebook’s applications better by providing insights to product development, minimizing bad experiences and shaping a healthy public content ecosystem is an important company priority you'll directly impact in this role. You will be required to showcase excellent leadership, people management, project management, problem solving, and communication across a highly cross-functional stakeholder base. Specifically, this role will lead a team that designs labeling processes and protocols, including machine learning, measurement, data annotation. They also increases operational maturity across our labeling programs; ensuring metrics remain above agreed upon targets and partners with cross-functional stakeholders to set up and scale labeling experiments consistent with privacy, legal, policy, and communication guidance.
